episodes.title: Peril at End House
episodes.plot: While Poirot is staying at an exclusive Cornish resort, he meets a beautiful heiress whose life is in danger.

episodes.title: The Veiled Lady
episodes.plot: Poirot becomes a criminal himself when he agrees to help a beautiful woman recover a letter written in her youth that is being used to blackmail her.

episodes.title: The Lost Mine
episodes.plot: When a Chinese businessman with a map to a long lost silver mine is found dead in Chinatown, Poirot must find the map and killer.

episodes.title: The Cornish Mystery
episodes.plot: Alice Pengelley visits Poirot in London, telling him she thinks she is being poisoned by her husband. When Poirot arrives in Cornwall the next day to investigate Mrs. Pengelley's charges, he is too late, and finds her dead.

episodes.title: The Disappearance of Mr. Davenheim
episodes.plot: Poirot wagers Chief Inspector Japp that he can solve the mystery of a missing banker without leaving his flat.

episodes.title: Double Sin
episodes.plot: A young woman is delivering a set of antique Napoleon miniatures to an American collector when they are stolen from her suitcase. Captain Hastings, under Poirot's guidance, sets out to find the thief.

episodes.title: The Adventure of the Cheap Flat
episodes.plot: When U.S. Navy plans for a new submarine are stolen and the thief tracked to London, the FBI sends an agent to work with Inspector Japp to recover them.

episodes.title: The Kidnapped Prime Minister
episodes.plot: When the prime minister is kidnapped right before an important international arms summit, Poirot has just 32--and a quarter--hours to find the prime minister.

episodes.title: The Adventure of the Western Star
episodes.plot: After receiving threatening letters, an aristocrat is robbed of her famed diamond in front of Poirot's eyes.
